description: The Apple 16'' MacBook Pro features a 16'' Retina Display, a Magic Keyboard with a redesigned scissor mechanism, a six-speaker high-fidelity sound system, and an advanced thermal design. This MacBook Pro also features an AMD Radeon Pro 5600M graphics card, a 7nm mobile discrete GPU designed for pro users. With 8GB of HBM2 memory, it delivers outstanding performance for demanding creative workflows.
This gaming chair offers superior comfort for long gaming sessions. The ergonomic design, adjustable features, and high-density foam ensure you stay comfortable and supported. Local pickup only.

The 2020 MacBook Air features Apple's revolutionary M1 chip, delivering incredible performance and battery life. The 13.3'' Retina display with True Tone provides stunning visuals, while the lightweight design makes it perfect for on-the-go use.
This Heimer Miller sofa is in mint condition, featuring a modern minimalist design and premium fabric upholstery. The solid wood frame ensures durability and comfort for your living space.
The iPad Pro 2017 features a stunning 12.9-inch Retina display, powerful A10X Fusion chip, and support for Apple Pencil. Perfect for productivity, creativity, and entertainment.
Capture stunning 4K60 video and 12MP photos with the GoPro Hero 7. Features HyperSmooth stabilization, waterproof design, and voice control for hands-free operation. Comes with original receipt.
Dell's 24-inch computer monitor features a crisp Full HD display, IPS panel for wide viewing angles, and an adjustable stand for ergonomic comfort. Ideal for work or home office setups.
AirPods Pro offer immersive sound with Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode. The customizable fit and wireless charging case make them perfect for everyday use.
This Playstation 4 Limited Edition console features a unique design, 1TB of storage, and comes with a DualShock 4 wireless controller. Enjoy 4K video streaming and a vast library of games.
The DJI Mavic Pro 2 drone features a 4K camera with a 3-axis gimbal, up to 31 minutes of flight time, and an 8km transmission range. Advanced obstacle sensing ensures safe and reliable flights.
